paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data from three case reports.

patients.phenotype: heart failure with preserved EF, atrial flutter

individual_records.phenotype_details: heart failure with preserved EF, atrial flutter
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Genetic testing confirmed a Val142Ile variant TTR gene mutation.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with transthyretin cardiac amyloidosis.

variants.additional_notes: The patient underwent successful transesophageal echocardiogram and direct current cardioversion.
key_quotes: Genetic testing confirmed a Val142Ile variant TTR gene mutation.

patients.phenotype: progressive dyspnea, weakness, palpitations, severe biatrial enlargement

individual_records.phenotype_details: progressive dyspnea, weakness, palpitations, severe biatrial enlargement
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Analysis of an endomyocardial biopsy specimen showed results that were consistent with amyloidosis, and mass spectrometry revealed ATTR-CA with an Ala140Ser variant, confirmed on genetic testing.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with transthyretin cardiac amyloidosis.

variants.additional_notes: The patient ultimately required orthotopic heart transplantation.
key_quotes: mass spectrometry revealed ATTR-CA with an Ala140Ser variant, confirmed on genetic testing.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
